Name: Aralia "Renzou" Street Lamp
Desc: A street lamp that can often be found in Inazuma City. This one is constructed from Aralia Wood. These shorter street lamps have designs that strongly take quick replacement and savings in wood usage into account when they are being built, thus making them easy to construct\nHowever, children find that adults who walk by these lamps at night take on most frightening countenances...
Source: Learned from Realm Depot Furnishing Blueprint
